alert.note: Alert for Burns BLM; Vale BLM (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued September 24 at 1:01PM PDT until September 25 at 7:00PM PDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...STRONG WINDS AND LOW RH EXPECTED MONDAY AFTERNOON AND EARLY EVENING... .Strong winds and low relative humidities are likely Monday afternoon into the early evening hours. Conditions will be worse in the southern half of Vale and Burns BLM districts than in the northern half. ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM MDT /2 PM PDT/ TO 8 PM MDT /7 PM PDT/ MONDAY FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITIES FOR OWYHEE MOUNTAINS...BURNS BLM AND VALE BLM...WHICH ARE FIRE WEATHER ZONES 423...636 AND 637... * WINDS...Sustained winds of 20 to 30 mph with gusts 30 to 45 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...10 to 17%.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will occur shortly.
